name: PTree
description: Design power trees and estimate consumptions

scripts.dist:mac: electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac   && cd bin && mv PTree.dmg PTree-macos.dmg && rm -rf mac
scripts.dist:win: electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win   && cd bin && mv win-unpacked        PTree && rm -f PTree-windows.zip && zip -r -X -y -q PTree-windows.zip PTree/ && rm -rf PTree
scripts.dist:lin: electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --linux && cd bin && mv linux-unpacked PTree && rm -f PTree-linux.zip   && zip -r -X -y -q PTree-linux.zip   PTree/ && rm -rf PTree
scripts.dist:all: npm run dist:mac  && npm run dist:win  && npm run dist:lin
